title: Preferences
description: Configure various application settings including queries, notifications, themes, etc.
software_style_description: Choose your preferred interface color theme
interface_settings_description: Customize the appearance and behavior of the application
auto_save_description: Automatically save queries and configuration changes
auto_connect_description: Automatically connect to the last used database on startup
show_internal_databases_description: Whether to display _internal and other system databases in the data source tree
show_internal_databases_note: Note: Monitoring features are always available regardless of this setting
system_health_check_description: Check the running status of the performance monitoring system
export_config_description: Save all current application settings, connection configurations, and user preferences to a file
import_config_description: Restore application settings, connection configurations, and user preferences from a configuration file
reset_config_description: Reset all settings to default values (does not affect connection configurations)
user_guide_description: Manage user guidance and help prompts
startup_guide_description: Control whether to automatically display user guide when the application starts
enable_startup_guide_description: When enabled, user guide will be displayed every time the application starts
open_source_description: InfloWave is an open source project. Contributions and feedback are welcome.
startup_guide_enabled: Startup guide enabled, will be displayed on next startup
guide_settings_reset: Guide settings reset, will be displayed again on next startup
health_check_success: Health check completed, system running normally
internal_db_enabled: Internal database display enabled and list refreshed
internal_db_disabled: Internal database display disabled and list refreshed
language_management_description: Manage supported languages and translation resources
cannot_disable_current_language: Cannot disable the currently active language
quick_settings_description: Quickly toggle common query and security settings
delete_statement_description: Allow execution of data deletion statements
drop_statement_description: Allow execution of table/database deletion statements
lazy_load_description: Delay loading for large datasets to improve performance
lazy_load_threshold_description: Enable lazy loading when exceeding this number of rows

quick_settings_panel.title: Security Settings
quick_settings_panel.allow_dangerous_operations_description: Allow particularly dangerous operations like DROP DATABASE/MEASUREMENT

controller_settings.title: Query Settings
controller_settings.description: Manage query execution and security controls
controller_settings.security_warning_message: Enabling DELETE and DROP statements may result in data loss. Please operate with caution and keep them disabled in production environments.
controller_settings.statement_permissions_description: Control which types of SQL statements can be executed
controller_settings.allow_delete_statements_description: Allow execution of DELETE FROM statements to delete data
controller_settings.allow_drop_statements_description: Allow execution of DROP DATABASE, DROP MEASUREMENT statements
controller_settings.allow_dangerous_operations_description: Allow execution of operations that may result in data loss
controller_settings.security_confirmation_description: Add additional confirmation steps for dangerous operations
controller_settings.require_confirmation_for_delete_descript: Show confirmation dialog before executing DELETE statements
controller_settings.require_confirmation_for_drop_descriptio: Show confirmation dialog before executing DROP statements
controller_settings.query_performance_description: Configure performance optimization options for query execution
controller_settings.enable_lazy_loading_description: Use lazy loading mode when clicking "All", loading data in batches to reduce database pressure. When disabled, all data will be loaded at once (may cause performance issues)
controller_settings.lazy_loading_batch_size_description: Number of data rows loaded per batch, range: 100-10000 (recommended: 500-1000)

logging_settings.title: Logging Settings
logging_settings.description: Configure application log level and file storage
logging_settings.level_error_desc: Show only error messages (recommended for production)
logging_settings.level_info_desc: Show general information, warnings and errors (default)
logging_settings.level_debug_desc: Show all logs including debug information (for development)
logging_settings.console_logging_desc: Control log level displayed in browser console
logging_settings.debug_warning: ⚠️ DEBUG level generates large amounts of logs and may affect performance
logging_settings.file_logging_desc: Save logs to files for troubleshooting and analysis
logging_settings.max_file_size_desc: Automatically create new log file when exceeding this size
logging_settings.max_files_desc: Maximum number of historical log files to keep, oldest files will be deleted automatically
logging_settings.delete_all_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete all log files? This action cannot be undone.
logging_settings.load_failed: Failed to load log file list

update_settings.title: Update Settings
update_settings.auto_check_desc: Automatically check for new versions on startup
update_settings.auto_download_desc: Automatically download when new version is found
update_settings.auto_install_desc: Automatically install after download (requires app restart)
update_settings.check_interval_desc: Time interval for automatic update checks
update_settings.update_channel_desc: Select channel to receive updates from
update_settings.notify_on_update_desc: Show notification when new version is found
update_settings.skipped_versions_desc: These versions will not prompt for update again
update_settings.enable_notifications_desc: Turn all notifications on or off
update_settings.pinned_queries_desc: Show frequently used queries in sidebar
update_settings.auto_check_desc: Periodically check for new versions and notify you
update_settings.update_notification_desc: Show notification when new version is found
update_settings.include_prerelease_desc: Check for Beta and RC versions
update_settings.check_now_desc: Manually check if new version is available
update_settings.skipped_versions_desc_full: List of versions you chose to skip
